items.sentence: I can\'t sing very well and neither can you.
Tom had no idea where he was supposed to go.
Tom invited all of his friends to his party.
Tom knew nothing about cooking Chinese food.
Did you know your air conditioner is broken?
I\'ll miss you terribly if you leave Boston.
The story Tom told us was very heartwarming.
There are about thirty goldfish in our pond.
I\'d prefer not to do that until after 2:30.
It wasn\'t Tom who requested that I do this.
Tom told me he thought this was a good idea.
Tom told me he wanted me to do that for him.
It\'s something that bothers me quite a bit.
It\'s taking longer than I thought it would.
It\'s unclear how long Tom wants us to stay.
Do you know what you just allowed to happen?
You might not get another chance to do that.
You never really talked about Tom that much.
I didn\'t anticipate that you would be here.
I didn\'t even have a chance to talk to Tom.
